title: Nintendo Calls Out Activision Blizzard's Toxicity - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.23.21
description:
Gary and Tamoor offer an update on the Activision Blizzard situation, as well as noisy Xbox mini-fridges, and more.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start Fall Guy talk
00:09:40 - Housekeeping
This week is Thanksgiving week in the United States and so no KFGD or livestreams after Tuesday this week.
There is a brand new PS I Love You XOXO out now and it is a hell of an episode. Blessing and Janet do their “Best PlayStation Character” bracket. That went down live on Patreon where viewers had the opportunity to vote in straw polls to break ties and help determine the characters that moved on. If you missed it, no worries, the episode is available to all now and it’s definitely worth checking out.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:11:30 - Activision Blizzard Creates A "Workplace Responsibility Committee" In Wake Of Bobby Kotick Situation - GameSpot, Eddie Makuch
00:22:40 - Nintendo Responds To "Distressing And Disturbing" Activision Blizzard And Bobby Kotick Reports -- GameSpot, Eddie Makuch
00:30:15 - Ad
00:33:23 - PSA: The Xbox Mini Fridge Is Loud And Annoying -- GameSpot, Gabe Gurwin
00:41:30 - The upcoming ‘big PlayStation remake’ is reportedly Chrono Cross -- VGC, Tom Ivan
00:47:20 - Harmonix Joins Epic Games
00:57:00 - Out today
00:59:50 - You‘re Wrong

content:encoded:
Gary and Tamoor offer an update on the Activision Blizzard situation, as well as noisy Xbox mini-fridges, and more.


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start Fall Guy talk

00:09:40 - Housekeeping

This week is Thanksgiving week in the United States and so no KFGD or livestreams after Tuesday this week.

There is a brand new PS I Love You XOXO out now and it is a hell of an episode. Blessing and Janet do their “Best PlayStation Character” bracket. That went down live on Patreon where viewers had the opportunity to vote in straw polls to break ties and help determine the characters that moved on. If you missed it, no worries, the episode is available to all now and it’s definitely worth checking out.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
